mapper.select: select team_code as teamCode, dept_code as departCode, team_name as teamName from sales_teams order by team_code asc

SELECT em.emp_id as empId, em.emp_pw as empPw, em.emp_name as empName, em.emp_position as position, em.emp_phone as phone, em.team_code as teamCode, tm.team_name as team FROM sales_employee em INNER JOIN sales_teams tm on em.team_code = tm.team_code WHERE emp_id = #{empId}
mapper.insert: insert into sales_employee(emp_id, emp_pw, emp_name, emp_phone, team_code, emp_position) values(#{empId}, #{empPw}, #{empName}, #{phone}, #{team}, #{position})
